body_text: You can leave out surveyId and surveyVersion here since this test is only about checking if the testing argument is present. The others are handled in a different test.
body: You can leave out `surveyId` and `surveyVersion` here since this test is only about checking if the `testing` argument is present. The others are handled in a different test.
